front.title: Evaluating Multi-homing Support in NEMO Basic Solution

abstract.t: This draft describes and explains prerequisites for NEMO Basic tosupport Multi-homing. We study those prerequisites with respect toeach case of a taxonomy proposed to the NEMO WG and we analyze howthe NEMO basic support solution fits with them. The analysis of eachcase listed in this taxonomy is broken into three parts,prerequisites, comments, and solution behaviors.
